snippet: The former Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams will meet again with league security officials Monday in New York.
abstract: Former New Orleans Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams will meet again with NFL security officials regarding the league's investigation into bounty system that rewarded players for injuring opponents.
lead_paragraph: The former Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams will meet again with league security officials Monday in New York.

headline.seo: Gregg Williams Will Meet Again With N.F.L. Officials
headline.main: Williams Set for Meeting With N.F.L. Officials
